content: The Overwhelmed User: This archetype represents users who feel overwhelmed or stressed when interacting with the Cita Previa website. They may feel like there is too much information or too many steps involved in the process, as demonstrated by the quote "The typography is awful and had me feeling a little overwhelmed, even if the information was simple." They may struggle to navigate the website or complete tasks due to the complexity of the user flow. This archetype could include older users or users who are not as comfortable with technology, as well as users who may be unfamiliar with the website or who do not speak Spanish.
